stories.text:
I am looking for an individual on a contracting / freelancing basis to join the team for a period of between 6-12 months (potentially longer). I am looking for someone who is genuinely excited about the combination of data and sports, and is ready to hit the ground running.

Email: jwsmith [at] wyattai.com Website: wyattai.com Job posting: https://wyattai.com/ds1/

Requirements: Strong python skills, machine learning experience with video inputs, AWS experience.

Advantages: An absolute love for soccer, tennis or hockey. Experience building ETL pipelines. Knowledge about graph and transformer NNs.
stories.title: Seeking Freelancer – Montreal, Canada| Remote

stories.text:
Hi HN,

My friend has a business page on Instagram with a very large following over the years and all of a sudden it keeps getting taken down.

I have no idea how people are able to take Instagram pages down at will, I told him to contact Facebook / Meta to reinstate this but he hasn't heard back from them.

Any thoughts on this and has this happened to you? What should I do in this situation?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do Instagram pages get hacked / taken down?
Branching out: is communication possible between trees and people? (2021)

Finnish diplomats’ phones infected with NSO Group Pegasus spyware
NextUI – Beautiful, fast and modern React UI library

stories.text:
When I woke up I said: "today I am NOT watching YouTube, Netflix or read HN." I said this yesterday, it seemed to have worked in helping me to go from not doing much to being quite productive because of the boredom that surrounded me.

Did you do something similar? How did having a not-to-do list work for you in the long term?
stories.title: Ask HN: Have you ever written a not-to-do list? How did it work out?
